channel.title: Need help with command

item.title: Need help with command
item.dc:creator: @Kryaxysa Kryaxysa
item.description:
@Kryaxysa wrote:

ok, everytime i try to enter my command like ::item 4835 10000 it says bad item id number, i want to spawn 10000 ourg noted bones, whats wrong?

if(s.startsWith("item")) try { int k = Integer.parseInt(s.substring(5)); if(k >= 0) createItem(k); else sendMessage("No such item"); } catch(Exception exception1) { sendMessage("Bad item ID"); } else

Read full topic
